content.question: Which of the following best explains the reason for the creation of businesses such as the one depicted in the image?

choices.label: African Americans refused to support mainstream businesses during the period of segregation.
African Americans created businesses to sustain their communities in response to their exclusion from mainstream society.
African Americans had no access to white-owned businesses, which prompted the development of their own institutions.
African Americans were forced by law to only buy from businesses within their communities.

content.answer: African Americans created businesses to sustain their communities in response to their exclusion from mainstream society.
